description: Michael Wayne is out running and stops at his friend Rick Turner's place to pick up his bike.  Rick invites him to use the sauna that he has.  Things really heat up in the sauna when Rick asks Michael if he has ever had a blow job from another guy.  Michael hasn't but doesn't refuse Rick when he asks politely if he can suck his cock.  When they're done in the sauna Rick and Michael clean up with a shower shot in the bathroom...filling their asses and spraying them out.
title: Spring Training, Scene #01
